title: The Reluctant Killer
description: This is the story of a man that had to fight for his life not once, but twice. Diagnosed as being HIV positive and very seriously ill, he fights his way back to health. He gets a job, a new partner and he finally thinks he is getting his life back.Then on a holiday to New York to celebrate, he doesn't realise that killers are at large on the streets again. Terrorists set on getting their comrades released from a detention centre in Afghanistan. Mark Thorpe gets kidnapped and held hostage, events beyond his control look set to destroy his life again. He isn't prepared to die at the hands of the terrorists, but he doesn't know for sure how he is going to be able to fight back, but fighting back is all that is in his mind and all he needs is one chance.
author: Robert Durrant
